sn22.47:1.2: “Ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samana va brahmana va anekavihitam attanam samanupassamana samanupassanti, sabbete pancupadanakkhandhe samanupassanti, etesam va annataram.
sn22.47:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, assutava puthujjano ariyanam adassavi ariyadhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinito, sappurisanam adassavi sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinito
sn22.47:1.5: rupam attato samanupassati, rupavantam va attanam; attani va rupam, rupasmim va attanam.
sn22.47:1.9: vinnanam attato samanupassati, vinnanavantam va attanam; attani va vinnanam, vinnanasmim va attanam.
sn22.47:2.1: Iti ayanceva samanupassana ‘asmi’ti cassa avigatam hoti.
sn22.47:2.2: ‘Asmi’ti kho pana, bhikkhave, avigate pancannam indriyanam avakkanti hoti—
sn22.47:2.4: Atthi, bhikkhave, mano, atthi dhamma, atthi avijjadhatu.
sn22.47:2.5: Avijjasamphassajena, bhikkhave, vedayitena phutthassa assutavato puthujjanassa ‘asmi’tipissa hoti;
sn22.47:3.2: Athettha sutavato ariyasavakassa avijja pahiyati, vijja uppajjati.
